weather_uuid.name: weather_uuid
weather_uuid.description: Unique identifier for each weather record

temperature_2m.name: temperature_2m
temperature_2m.description: Temperature at 2 meters above ground level in celsius

relative_humidity_2m.name: relative_humidity_2m
relative_humidity_2m.description: Relative humidity at 2 meters above ground level in percentage

dew_point_2m.name: dew_point_2m
dew_point_2m.description: Dew point temperature at 2 meters above ground level in celsius

apparent_temperature.name: apparent_temperature
apparent_temperature.description: Apparent temperature, also known as the 'feels like' temperature in celsius

snow_depth.name: snow_depth
snow_depth.description: Depth of snow on the ground in millimeters

weather_code.name: weather_code
weather_code.description: Code representing the weather conditions in WMO code

pressure_msl.name: pressure_msl
pressure_msl.description: Atmospheric pressure at mean sea level in hectopascals

surface_pressure.name: surface_pressure
surface_pressure.description: Atmospheric pressure at the surface in hectopascals

cloud_cover.name: cloud_cover
cloud_cover.description: Fraction of the sky covered by clouds in percentage

cloud_cover_low.name: cloud_cover_low
cloud_cover_low.description: Fraction of the sky covered by low-level clouds in percentage

cloud_cover_mid.name: cloud_cover_mid
cloud_cover_mid.description: Fraction of the sky covered by mid-level clouds in percentage

cloud_cover_high.name: cloud_cover_high
cloud_cover_high.description: Fraction of the sky covered by high-level clouds in percentage

et0_fao_evapotranspiration.name: et0_fao_evapotranspiration
et0_fao_evapotranspiration.description: Reference evapotranspiration calculated using the FAO Penman-Monteith method in millimeters per day

vapour_pressure_deficit.name: vapour_pressure_deficit
vapour_pressure_deficit.description: Difference between the amount of moisture in the air and how much moisture the air can hold when it is saturated in kilopascals

wind_speed_10m.name: wind_speed_10m
wind_speed_10m.description: Wind speed at 10 meters above ground level in kilometers per hour

soil_temperature_0_to_7cm.name: soil_temperature_0_to_7cm
soil_temperature_0_to_7cm.description: Soil temperature at a depth of 0 to 7 centimeters in celsius

soil_moisture_0_to_7cm.name: soil_moisture_0_to_7cm
soil_moisture_0_to_7cm.description: Soil moisture at a depth of 0 to 7 centimeters in m3/m3

soil_temperature_7_to_28cm.name: soil_temperature_7_to_28cm
soil_temperature_7_to_28cm.description: Soil temperature at a depth of 7 to 28 centimeters in celsius

soil_moisture_7_to_28cm.name: soil_moisture_7_to_28cm
soil_moisture_7_to_28cm.description: Soil moisture at a depth of 7 to 28 centimeters in m3/m3

wind_speed_100m.name: wind_speed_100m
wind_speed_100m.description: Wind speed at 100 meters above ground level in kilometers per hour

city.name: city
city.description: Name of the city where the weather observation was recorded
